name: Donald BETHEA, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents

parties: Donald BETHEA, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of June, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
140 A.3d 675
Donald BETHEA, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents.
No. 60 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 20, 2016.
